.shopfront__image{display:block;margin:auto;max-width:100%;height:200px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product-info{padding-top:16px;border-top:1px solid #ddd}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__title{overflow:hidden;font-size:17px;margin:0 0 9px;padding:0 15px;max-height:40px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__title-link{font-weight:400;text-decoration:none!important}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link{position:relative;clear:both;display:block;width:100%;padding:15px;height:50px;font-size:17px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link:hover:after{background-position-y:-14px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link:after{content:'';display:block;position:absolute;top:50%;right:15px;margin-top:-6.5px;height:13px;width:8px;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:68px;background-position:-60px 0}@media only screen and (min-width:600px){.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront{width:960px;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;-webkit-flex-direction:row;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront .product-meta{padding-left:40px;border-bottom:none}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__card{margin-bottom:13px;margin-right:10px;width:390px;height:485px;float:left;transition:box-shadow .3s}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__card:last-child{margin-right:auto}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__card:hover{box-shadow:rgba(0,0,0,.15) 0 2px 10px 0}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._big .shopfront__product-sticker{top:30px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._big .shopfront__product-sticker .bonus,.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .shopfront__product-sticker .bonus{margin:0}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._big .shopfront__product-sticker .bonus+.discount{position:static;margin-top:5px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small{height:140px;padding:15px 0;display:-webkit-flex;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-align-items:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small:last-of-type{border:none}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .shopfront__image-link{padding:0 0 0 15px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .shopfront__image{width:80px;min-width:80px;height:60px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .shopfront__product-info{height:auto}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .shopfront__title{max-width:295px;max-height:33px;height:auto;font-size:14px;padding-left:25px;margin-bottom:12px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .product-meta{padding:0 0 0 25px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__image-link{margin:0 25px 25px;padding-top:25px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__image{height:200px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product-info{height:170px;padding-top:0;border:none}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__title{height:55px;font-size:24px;margin:0 0 15px;padding:0 40px;max-height:55px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link{padding:22px 40px 15px;border-top:1px solid #ddd;height:65px;font-size:17px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link:hover:after{background-position-y:-14px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link:after{right:40px;margin-top:-6.5px;height:13px;width:8px;background-size:68px;background-position:-60px 0}}@media only screen and (min-width:1280px){.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront{width:1190px}}@media only screen and (min-width:600px) and (max-width:1279px){.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront .product-meta,.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link,.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__title{padding-left:15px;padding-right:15px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__group-link:after{right:15px}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .product-meta__buy-now{border:none}.kaspiShopping__wrapper .shopfront__product._small .product-meta__installment{padding-left:0;clear:left}}.shopfront__product-sticker{position:absolute;top:10px;left:10px;z-index:1;box-sizing:border-box}

        </style>

        window.digitalData.listing = listing;
    }
    else
    {
        if (!digitalData.recommendation) digitalData.recommendation = [];
        window.digitalData.recommendation.push(listing);

        <script>
         BACKEND = {
            'config': {
                'analytics': {
                    'proceedToUrlTimeout': 500
                }
            }
        };

        impressions = [];
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            var teasers = document.querySelectorAll('.shopfront__product');
            Array.prototype.forEach.call(teasers, function (el) {
                var gaProduct = el.getAttribute('data-ga-product');
                if (gaProduct !== null) {
                    var product = JSON.parse(gaProduct);
                    impressions.push(product);
                }
            });
            var ecommerce = {
                'currencyCode': 'KZT',
                'impressions': impressions
            };

            if (typeof dataLayer !== 'undefined') {
                dataLayer.push({'ecommerce': ecommerce});
            }
        });
        </script>
        <script>
         !function a(b,c,d){function e(g,h){if(!c[g]){if(!b[g]){var i="function"==typeof require&&require;if(!h&&i)return i(g,!0);if(f)return f(g,!0);var j=new Error("Cannot find module '"+g+"'");throw j.code="MODULE_NOT_FOUND",j}var k=c[g]={exports:{}};b[g][0].call(k.exports,function(a){var c=b[g][1][a];return e(c?c:a)},k,k.exports,a,b,c,d)}return c[g].exports}for(var f="function"==typeof require&&require,g=0;g<d.length;g++)e(d[g]);return e}({1:[function(a,b,c){"use strict";function d(a){return a&&a.__esModule?a:{"default":a}}var e=a("./kaspibank-landing"),f=d(e)["default"];f.init()},{"./kaspibank-landing":2}],2:[function(a,b,c){"use strict";function d(){document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){})}Object.defineProperty(c,"__esModule",{value:!0}),c["default"]={init:d}},{}]},{},[1]);
//# sourceMappingURL=app.js.map
        </script>
       </div>
      </section>
      <section class="startSection__wrapper payments__wrapper" id="payments">
       <div class="startSection__title">
        Платежи без комиссий
       </div>
       <div class="startSection__subtitle">
        Оплата более 3000 услуг, за 1 минуту, не выходя из дома.
       </div>
       <div class="startSection__body payments__inner">
        <div class="payments__items">
         <a class="payments__item payments__item--beeline" href="/pay/beeline?ref=startPayments">
          <div class="paymentsItem__icon">
          </div>
          <div class="paymentsItem__title">
           Мобильный
          </div>
          <div class="paymentsItem__text">
           Пополнить баланс
           <br class="full"/>
           мобильного
          </div>
         </a>
         <a class="payments__item payments__item--fine" href="/pay/fine?ref=startPayments">
          <div class="paymentsItem__icon">
          </div>
          <div class="paymentsItem__title">
           Штрафы ПДД
          </div>
          <div class="paymentsItem__text">
           Проверить и оплатить
           <br class="full"/>
           штраф онлайн
          </div>
         </a>

          <div class="paymentsItem__title">
           Казахтелеком
          </div>

           <br class="full"/>
           и оплатить
          </div>
         </a>

          <div class="paymentsItem__icon">
          </div>
          <div class="paymentsItem__text">
           Оплатить
           <br/>
           детский сад
          </div>
         </a>

          <div class="paymentsItem__icon">
          </div>
          <div class="paymentsItem__text">
           Оплатить налоги
           <br/>
           по всей РК
          </div>
         </a>
        </div>
        <a class="payments__item payments__item--all" href="/pay?ref=startPayments">
         <div class="paymentsItem__title">
          Все платежи
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </section>

    var script = decodeURIComponent("%3Cscript src= type='text/javascript'%3E%3C/script%3E");
